text: Richard Stanley may refer to: * Richard H. Stanley (1823–1875), American lawyer and politician in the Kingdom of Hawaii * Richard Stanley (politician) (1920–1983), British Conservative Party Member of Parliament, 1950–66 * (born 1943), British-born film director and music producer who relocated to Finland * Richard P. Stanley (born 1944), American mathematician * Richard Stanley (director) (born 1966), South African-born film director and screenwriter * Richard Stanley, an early stage name of the actor better known as Dennis Morgan
title: Richard Stanley
